mapper.sql: id, name, code_number, create_time, end_time, max_number, min_number, is_used,shop_detail_id,brand_id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_table_code (id, name, code_number, create_time, end_time, max_number, min_number, is_used,shop_detail_id,brand_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maxNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isUsed,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_table_code
id, name, code_number, create_time, end_time, max_number, min_number, is_used, shop_detail_id, brand_id,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maxNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isUsed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shopDetailId}, #{brandId},
mapper.update:
update tb_table_code
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_number = #{codeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, max_number = #{maxNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_number = #{minNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, shop_detail_id = #{shopDetailId}, brandId = #{brandId}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_table_code set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_number = #{codeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, max_number = #{maxNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_number = #{minNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=TINYINT},shop_detail_id = #{shopDetailId},brand_id=#{brandId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, code_number, max_number, min_number, is_used, shop_detail_id, brand_id FROM tb_table_code WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT id, name, code_number, max_number, min_number, is_used, shop_detail_id, brand_id FROM tb_table_code WHERE code_number = #{codeNumber}
SELECT id, name, code_number, max_number, min_number, is_used, shop_detail_id, brand_id FROM tb_table_code WHERE shop_detail_id = #{shopId}

select id, name, code_number, max_number, min_number, is_used, shop_detail_id, brand_id from tb_table_code where min_number < #{personNumber} and max_number > #{personNumber} and is_used = 1 order by (max_number - min_number) asc limit 1

select t.* ,(select count(1) from tb_get_number where state = 0 and table_type = t.code_number and t.is_used = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') ) as waitNumber from tb_table_code t where t.is_used = 1 and t.shop_detail_id = #{shopId}
